CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 29, 1955, pg. B4, reads: "Chef DeLuxe - With his wife, Edna, and daughter, Elrayne, 3, expressing approval, E. W. Knox, 44, of 824 Progress Street, North Side, prepares a choice dish like the chili con carne which recently won him a first prize at Pittsburgh's Food Fair. Fourteen years ago, Mrs. Knox started giving cooking lessons to her husband, a retired Pullman porter, an arthritic victim. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: E. W. Knox wearing chef hat, Elrayne Knox, and Edna Knox, posed in kitchen of their home, 824 Progress Street, Northside, horizontal format
